After a few days, you woke up and realized that you were in hospital. Beside you, you saw Melissa, who is sleeping soundly while crossing her hands on your bed. Surprised with her presence, maybe she felt something about Felix. You tried to move your hands and felt slightly different from before. When at the funeral, you hardly move your body as it felt like someone constrained your actions. You moved Felix's fingers one by one. Still amazed to be alive again, a sudden warm touched your hands.

You saw Melissa held your hands tightly with hers. She quickly hugged you while her tears dripping on your shirt. "Mel, are you alright??" asked you. Melissa answered you with cracked voice because of the cry, "Please, Felix. Don't do that again. Don't leave me. I have no one else.Not after Matthew leave me." When she said your name, her cry became so painful to be heard. You hugged Melissa softly, "Don't worry, Mel. I won't leave you. I will be by your side forever".

The passionate hug remained for a few minutes.After she calmed down, Melissa stopped crying and released her hug. She smiled weakly after hearing your answer. You returned a smile to her. Both of you chuckled a little. "Felix, you need to rest a little bit. I will call the doctor and tell him that you have awake" she leave you alone for awhile.

"What a sweet moment to see her smile again. Mel have gone through the hardest thing in her life as she see me died in front of her eyes" thought you while waiting for the doctor. A couple minutes have passed, you heard someone rushed towards your room. A doctor and two nurses quickly checked you and they quite surprised to see you woke up.
1431.title: After you awake...

14311.content:
"What a miracle, Felix. We think that we will lost you in a few days" said Doctor Sam happily. You confused, "Why doctor?? What happened to me when I'm unconscious??" asked you. The doctor held his pointed chin and tried to figure an explanation about your condition. "Hmm.. how I want to put it...after you collapsed at your friend's funeral, somehow your heart beats pumped so weak as you about to die....when you arrive here, we tried all we can to make your heart beats pumped normally but its all wasted... so we leave for awhile and estimated that your heart will stop in two days ahead and somehow you wake up... that's all I can explain to you" He looked at you and saw that you fell asleep. Yeah... that long explanation made you bored to death.

"It's okay, doctor. Maybe he need some rest for now. Felix's body is still weak. I will take care of him" said Melissa. The people emptied the room and leave Melissa and you only. "Felix, have a nice sleep. You need to recover soon" After that she fell asleep beside you. You woke up after a moment and ran your hand through her hairs. You tried to recollect your memories when you fell unconscious at the funeral and coma for a few days.

Its all begin with a weird dream about Felix and an entity.
14311.title: Explanation

143111.content:
The memories came back to you. In the dream, you saw Felix's soul imprisoned in a diamond-like prism. You flew around it to take a look. Suddenly, a woman figure appeared in front of you. You stumbled back a little bit.

"Don't be afraid. I'm just your guardian, Matthew." said the figure. You dazzled. How she knew your name?? She walked towards you and whispered to your ear, "Do you want to be alive?? Do you want Felix's body??"

You are silent in a moment. This was a chance for you to be alive again and took care of Melissa. As you were lost in your thought, the woman offered her hand to you and guided you to somewhere else.

When both of you stopped, she questioned, "Your answer??" Without hesitation, you replied, "Yes". She grinned. "My name is Hecate. I am the guardian of spirits. Usually, I will guide the spirits to afterlife without any problems. But your case is special and lovely indeed" Hecate chuckled.

She flicked her fingers and a screen with picture of Melissa revealed. "Matthew, why you love her so much?? What she mean to you??" You blushed. Maybe it's a little embarrassing to tell her. "You don't have to tell me... I know all about it" she laughed. Your face became redden like tomato which about to explode.

"Back to business, if you want to be alive again, you need use the power that have been bestowed upon you to help the others. Likely to start with your family and friends". The power must be the possession. "You mean possessing other people?? asked you. Hecate nodded.

She flicked her fingers once again and the diamond contained Felix's soul popped up in front of you. "Another one, you also have to find a way to obtain his body permanently without having two souls in a body". When she mentioned about permanent body that mean you have to eradicate Felix's soul.

"How about Felix, is he will not live again??" Hecate's face looked sour.
143111.title: Dream of Consciousness

1431111.content:
"Why you possess him in the first place?? Why don't possess other people at your funeral??" asked Hecate in high tone. For awhile, you felt guilty for what you have done. "Never mind to answer it, I know about it already" again she mentioned she knew everything about you. She flicked her fingers and "The reason for my words is if you want to be alive as Felix, you must sacrifice him. This is what we call the ultimate sacrifice. The person you choose must have a strong link with you because it will make the process better". You looked upon Felix's soul. "I'm sorry, Felix. I have to do it for Melissa"

After you agree to help the people with your power and to sacrifice Felix, Hecate summoned a scribe. The scribe wrote an agreement that you must fulfill in order to become alive again. "If you break this agreement, something unpleasant will happen to you. Now, you are ready to go" She pushed you towards a deep pit. You fell down into the darkness of abyss.

Now, you have remembered what you must do after this. The doctor said that you will be staying in the hospital for a week, to make sure your body in a good condition. For this whole week, I need to leave Felix body for awhile every night to complete my task.
1431111.title: An ultimate sacrifice

choices: Another supernatural being comes into the picture
15.content:
You see your father standing in the corner. He's understandably upset. He just lost a son. He was driving you to a party when the drunk drivers hit his car and killed you; he probably feels guilty for your death. Your dad hasn't talked sense the accident. He tried to talk during the funeral service, but he could barely speak. Your mom is upstairs. She hasn't been downstairs sense after the funeral service. You decide to possess your father so you can comfort her. You try phasing into him, but you just pass through his body. Your dad feels a slight chill, but he just brushes it off and walks up stairs. You follow him to your old room; it looks just as you left it. You see one of the video games you use to play on the floor and remember a game where you had to scare the host before you possess them in order for it to work. You figure you'd give that a shot.

You try to possess the picture of yourself your dad's holding and it works. You concentrate and are able to break the glass. "What the hell?" your father says confused by what just happened. You then concentrate on changing the reflection of the glass. As your dad inspects the glass plate, he notices in the reflection of himself he sees someone standing behind him. He sees you standing behind him! He turns around, then looks back at the picture. You used your powers to fix the glass while your dad looked away.

"Ok Jon. You need to get a hold of yourself." Your dad says to himself. You dispossess the picture and head toward the radio. You notice a thin yellow glow around your dad. That means it's working. You turn on the radio and play your favorite song; the song that annoyed your dad to the point where he told you never to play it in the house again.

"What's going on." Your dad walks over to the radio. "Dad." You whisper through the radio. He leans closer to the radio. You then play the sound of the crash and break your radio. "Holy shit!" Your dad freaks out. You know see that the lining is red. Now it your chance to possess him. You phase into his body from the front, but your father puts up a fight. He falls down on the floor and fights for control over his body. He tries to scream, but he can't. All that comes out are grunting and moaning sounds. He starts to convulse for a minute, then you are in complete control.

You stand your father's body up and walk over to your parent's room to comfort your mom. "Sarah, you should come down." You say in your father's voice. It feels weird moving and speaking in his body, but you try your best to act like him.

Your mom doesn't respond. She just sits on the bed and stares blankly into space. You walk up to her and put your father's arm on her back. "We're all upset, but you need to say good bye in order to heal. Come down stairs with me." She looks at you and starts crying. You wrap your dad's arms around her and after a few minutes of crying she say "Ok, just promise you won't leave me." "I promise." you say.

...
You say in your dad's body for a few days. Things seem to slowly be getting back to normal. Your mom seems to be holding up well and your siblings are back in school. Your dad's leave of absence from his job as a paramedic ends tomorrow and you wonder if now's a good time to leave his body.
15.title: Your father.

151.content: After while in your father you decide be him while he here for you when you alive. You want to understand so you open mind with him to understand.
151.title: Stay in your father's body

153.content:
Your stomach shifts as you wake one morning a few days after your dad's possession. It must have been too long, you think. Your body arches on the body and contracts, and you can feel your spirit being pushed out. You and your dad let out a scream at the same time.

"Honey!! Wake up!" you heard your mom say as she vigorously shook your dad. "W-what? What happened?" your dad yells. "It was just a dream. You're fine" your mom replied back. You looked at your dad's rugged face and saw tears rolling down. He must've been thinking about me while he was dormant, you think.

You float around the house and see your uncle sleeping on the couch. He's a member of the military but has come to visit your family and to see your funeral. You felt your stomach grumble and realized that you needed to eat breakfast, but had no body to do so

http://41.media.tumblr.com/2836b13c08b2f...

You give his broad shoulder a tap, but he gives no reaction. You levitate a couch cushion and throw it at his protruding belly, which startles him awake. A yellow outline contours his body as he says "w-who did that?" You float into the recliner beside him and force it to push out. You possess the couch he's on and shake it violently, which causes him to jump off of it. "M-matthew? If that's you I'm going to need you to s-stop. No n-need to freak out Uncle Mike here" he says as red outlines his shivering form. You float up directly to his eyes, though he doesn't see you, and you push in.

Your uncle gets slammed into the wall and you can feel his heart rate rise. He arches his bavk and contorts his facial muscles as you fit your face into his. At the same time, you expand your scrawny form into his beefy torso. He moans, yet no screams exit his mouth. You place your small dick into his huge one, your butt into his bigger one, and expand your legs to meet his feet. He stumbles to the T.V. screen and looks at himself but instead sees your head and face wearing his shirt and shorts in his bulky body. At that moment, he convulses for the last time and falls back on the couch he was sleeping on and you gain control of your uncle.

You open your eyes and see his belly poking out of shirt. Both you and your uncle were hungry but you had to put your hygiene and bladder under priority. You walk to the bathroom, unused to your uncle's larger everything and run into your little sister. "Good morning, Uncle Mikey!!" she said with an enthusiastic voice attributed to only young children. "Hey hey Macy," you bend down to ruffle her hair. "...Matty used to do that" she mumbles as you see tears start forming in her eyes. "Shit!!" you think as you swoop her up and walk into her room, where you place her on the bed. Scratching your uncle's neck, you figure it woildnt be bad to tell her. You sit down on the bed, which sinks to your new weight, and say "hey Macy can I tell you a secret?" which sounds weird with your uncle's scratchy voice that only exists because of his military training. "I guess so" she says. You get off the bed and kneel on leg in front of her and say "notice anything different about me?" She squints and says "your eyes green like Matty's!" This catches you by surprise. Were they really green? "Uh... yeah. Macy, listen. Your big brother is in here" you say as you place your indoex finger on your uncle's chest. "Is that why you have green eyes?" she says. "I didn't know I did but I guess so. Now listen Macy. You can't tell anyone about this. It's our secret." Her eyes widened and she yelled "Matty you're a ghost!?" You covered her mouth before she woke up the entire house. "Shhhh. Yeah I'm a ghost. Don't tell anyone." You get up and begin to walk towards the bathroom. "I have to wash my face, alright?' you say. She winks at you and says "Alright, Uncle Mikey"

You look into the mirror above the sink and brush your hand through your Uncle's short, graying hair. "Never had one of these before" you say as you rub your uncle's beard. You examine his shirt and realize it's the same one you got him for Christmas two years ago. Your pecs, big arms, and fat stomach stretch the fabric just a tad but otherwise it's a perfect fit. You look at your uncle's eyes, which are indeed green."So my eye color is transferred to whoever I'm possessing..." You feel your bladder about to explode after brushing your teeth. "Aw shit. Oh well. Had to this twice a day with dad. Now I'll have to do it with you" you think. You open the front of your uncle's shorts and pull his boxer briefs down. As you take a leak you think "bigger than mine and my dad's...huh."

You walk into the kitchen and see your mom, your uncle's sister, cooking some bacon and eggs. "Good morning Michael. How's the couch last night?" You don't respond at first, forgetting you were in your uncle's body but then you say "h-huh? Oh well. Better than the night before. Think I'm getting used to it." She smiles and says "well don't break it big guy or else I'm going to have to kick you out." You laugh but Michael's hearty chuckles leaves your mouth instead. Your dad walks in and says good morning to you and your mom. "Geez what day is it today? Feels like I've been asleep for longer than I should have been." Your mom gets a face of concern and says "Wednesday, honey." Your dad's eyes widened and he says "oh yeah? Well I don't recall Monday or Tuesday. I remember some weird stuff happening on Sunday but then I passed out." You felt bad for your father but couldn't apologize so you say "you were walking and talking no doubt Rob." He scratched his head and said "don't remember a thing. But I'll worry about that later. Let's eat.
153.title: Something weird happens

info.brief_description: A fatal accident causes things you never even imagined.
info.description:
Your name.
Matthew. Matthew Smith.
Such a generic name.
For a generic, average person.

You died today in a car accident. Quite tragic, it is.
And you were only 18.

Blood all over your body's dirty blonde hair.

You died unexpectedly, too.
Drunk drivers really are a thing to avoid.

But, what's this? You're seeing your body...you're...a spirit?

Yes.

Matthew, you're a spirit. You have the ability to possess others.
Any action you do in someone's body will only be remembered by the host if you command the host's mind to remember it.

Now, off you go, spirit. For who knows what awaits in the world of the spirits.
